about_the_game:
Handshakes: Hands On is the follow-up to the original shakefest, Handshakes. Control two or more hands through sokoban puzzles so that they may, you guessed it, shake hands. Hands are controlled individually or in sync and music push boxes, press buttons, open doors and even cut their own hands off to reach the goal!

Hands On expands upon the original game and adds:

  • Progression through the land of the Shakers
  • Level Editor to create, share and play levels with and from the community
  • All new mechanics such as portals, push/pull blocks, rotation pad, saw blades and more!
  • New music and art
  • 50+ all new puzzles to stretch your brain muscles
  • Localization

Handshakes: Hands On is a fully fledged realization of the original Handshakes game which you can play here:
detailed_description:
Roadmap

Handshakes: Hands On is currently in development and will be updated. The visuals previewed in the screenshots are still in early development so the end results will look different. We will likely open up a beta version at some point to start collecting feedback on the level editor and additional mechanics and puzzles. Wishlist and follow if you would like to be kept in the loop.
